dosing_details: An oral caffeine test was performed on the day before the tizanidine study day. The subjects ingested 100 mg caffeine (one 100-mg Cofi-Tabs tablet; Vitabalans, HÃ¤meenlinna, Finland) at 9 AM, after having abstained from caffeine intake for at least 12 hours, and a blood sample for analysis of plasma caffeine and paraxanthine (1,7-dimethylxanthine) concentrations was taken 6 hours after caffeine intake.
